Package io.github.ulalax.zmq

Class Proxy.Statistics

java.lang.Object
io.github.ulalax.zmq.Proxy.Statistics
Enclosing class:
Proxy
public static class Proxy.Statistics extends Object
Proxy statistics returned by STATISTICS command.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static Proxy.Statistics parse(byte[] data)
      Parses statistics from the 64-byte response.
      Parameters:
      data - The 64-byte statistics data (8 uint64 values)
      Returns:
      Parsed statistics
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if data length is not 64
